title: 16 Reasons How Mint is the Perfect 'Go-to Herb For All Seasons'
author: India com Lifestyle Staff
description: From fighting the cold to enjoying summer, mint is relevant in all seasons.

Mint is the solution to all problems. It provides you relief to your throat during the cold days and on summer days, it severs as a cool mojito drink. It is a perfect go-to herb as it provides relief to all problems like upset stomach, loss of energy, bad mood and cold. Taking it to Instagram, Dr. Dixa Bhavasar uploaded a picture talking about the health benefits of mint. The caption reads, "Mint is ma go-to herb for all seasons. Be it for the sore-throat during cold, a hot-tea in the rains or just a refreshing mohito during summers- Mint does it all. And what could be better than home-grown pudina. This is from my fiance's farm & I cant wait to smell & drink them right away (sic)." View this post on Instagram Along with it, the Ayurveda doctor also shared the important health benefits: Boil 7-10 mint leaves in a glass of water for 5 min. Strain & have it first thing in the morning. It will help in pacifying all your ailments. "A Mint tea is all you need & you are good to fight anything & everything- be it your bad mood, upset stomach, loss of energy or simple cold. Mint's to your rescue," says Dr. Dixa.
